00001 #include "Message.hh"
00002 #include "ParameterList.hh"
00003 #include "ConfigHandler.hh"
00004 #include "CommandSwitchFunctions.hh"
00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 #include <stdlib.h>
00007 int PrintHelp(const char*)
00008 {
00009   std::cerr<<"Usage: test [options] [<arg1>, <arg2> ... ]"<<std::endl;
00010   ConfigHandler::GetInstance()->PrintSwitches();
00011   exit(0);
00012 }
00013 
00014 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00015 {
00016   MESSAGE_LEVEL verbosity = INFO;
00017   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00018   config->AddCommandSwitch('v',"","increment verbosity",
00019                            CommandSwitch::Decrement<MESSAGE_LEVEL>(verbosity));
00020   config->AddCommandSwitch('q',"","decrement verbosity",
00021                            CommandSwitch::Increment<MESSAGE_LEVEL>(verbosity));
00022   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"verbosity","set verbosity to <verbosity>",
00023                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<MESSAGE_LEVEL>(verbosity),
00024                            "verbosity");
00025   config->AddCommandSwitch('h',"help","Display this help page",PrintHelp);
00026   
00027   try{
00028     config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00029   }
00030   catch(...){}
00031   MessageHandler::GetInstance()->SetThreshold(verbosity);
00032   Message(DEBUG)<<"I will not print by default"<<std::endl;
00033   Message(INFO)<<"I am plain"<<std::endl;
00034   Message(WARNING)<<"I am yellow!"<<std::endl;
00035   Message(ERROR)<<"I am red!"<<std::endl;
00036   Message(CRITICAL)<<"This is bad!"<<std::endl;
00037   Message(EXCEPTION)<<"This is worse!"<<std::endl;
00038   
00039   bool enable = true;
00040   unsigned int address = 0xEEEE0000;
00041   double time = 4.103;
00042   ParameterList l;
00043   l.RegisterParameter("address",address);
00044   l.RegisterParameter("time",time);
00045   l.RegisterParameter("enable",enable);
00046   Message(INFO)<<"The list is: "<<l;
00047   Message m(INFO);
00048   m<<"The command line is ";
00049   for(int i=0; i<argc; i++){
00050     m<<argv[i]<<" ";
00051   }
00052   m<<std::endl;
00053   Message(INFO)<<"Enter new values for address, enable, or time;"
00054                <<" ')' or ctrl-d to end."<<std::endl;
00055   try{
00056     std::cin>>l;
00057   }
00058   catch(...){
00059     Message(WARNING)<<"Exception occurred!"<<std::endl;
00060   }
00061   Message(INFO)<<"l is now "<<l;
00062   
00063   ParameterList a;
00064   ParameterList b;
00065   int a1=1, a2 = 2, a3 = 3;
00066   int b1 = 2, b2 = 4, b3 = 6;
00067   a.RegisterParameter("a1",a1);
00068   a.RegisterParameter("a2",a2);
00069   a.RegisterParameter("a3",a3);
00070   b.RegisterParameter("b1",b1);
00071   b.RegisterParameter("b2",b2);
00072   b.RegisterParameter("b3",b3);
00073   ConfigHandler * cfg = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00074   cfg->RegisterParameter("time",time);
00075   cfg->RegisterParameter("a",a);
00076   cfg->RegisterParameter("",b);
00077   double x = 2.120;
00078   cfg->RegisterParameter("x",x);
00079   
00080   std::cout<<*cfg<<std::endl;
00081   
00082   return 0;
00083 }
